title: The Night the Reindeer Died
description: The North Pole is abuzz as Christmas preparation is in full swing. But a group of psychos have other plans and seize Santa’s Workshop. Only Lee Majors can stop them.
quote: Lee, you’ve been a real good boy this year!
altHero: Mrs. Claus screams next to a concerned elf
alt2: Mrs. Claus and the elves grab guns off the wall
alt3: the elves holding guns behind a barricade
alt4: Lee Majors holds a gatling gun and talks with Santa and Mrs. Claus
